value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We will take the route Director Letizia
informed us of and return to Askr,
Princess Veronica.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|We need to investigate that village
that's enclosed in darkness as well.
I hope there's something we can do.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Indeed. Likewise, I will check on
the situation here in Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|...On that note—although I admit
that I cannot make promises, of
course—I will say this, at least:$k$pKeeping hope is a key factor of
success and I, too, endeavor to
maintain mine going forward.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|There's no need to worry! I'm sure
everything will turn out well.$k$pThen Askr and Embla can cooperate
and aid each other!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|...$k$pYes... Askr and—and Embla...$k$p$Sbs905|$Fo500,255,0,0,150|$Fi500|$EFace_Pain|Hrk! Urgh...$k$pGuhhh...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Princess...Veronica?$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Why... Suddenly, I— AAAGGGH!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|V-Veronica!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no... This is sure to be trouble.
For such a terrible thing to happen,
and now, of all times...$k$pThe curse of Embla's blood haunts
her body and mind, waiting for the
moment to take control of her...$k$pAnd she...Embla will seek to kill all
those who have come from Askr,
myself included...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|I must...kill.$k$p$Fo500,255,0,0,150|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy,Face|$Fi500|$c255,0,0,255|Kill...Askr...$c255,255,255,255|$k$p

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy,Face|$c255,0,0,255|Here... You die here... Askr!$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I've never seen Embla's curse
manifest like this before...$k$pFight it, Princess Veronica!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE10_06,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$c255,0,0,255|Kill... KILL...$c255,255,255,255|Nyah-AAAGH!$k$pThe voice... It won't stop...
telling me to kill...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Veronica, are you back
in control? Let me take a loo—$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No! Stay back. Run... Hurry!$k$pIf you stay here... You're as good
as dead...$k$pI won't be able...to stop it!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Everyone, pull back! Quickly!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The sight lines on this mountain
route are certainly not ideal for
understanding the terrain.$k$pThat said, I suppose it is preferable
to a retreat over an open field...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It's a good thing Letizia told us
this route was an option.$k$pUm... Ash? Are you all right back
there, by the way?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh... Heh... Yes. Thank you for
asking, and I do apologize for my
pace. I am impressed by you all.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|A scout report's just come in!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We have a problem. The bridge
up ahead has been knocked out.$k$pIn order to get back to Askr from
here, we'll have to take a rather
lengthy detour...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Commander Anna, does this mean...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It means someone is trying to stop
us from returning to Askr.$k$pBut...who? Surely it couldn't be
anyone who serves Princess
Veronica, could it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hm... An unknown foe...and one
that is likely close by even now.$k$pI suspect our return to Askr will
prove to be more of a challenge
than we had anticipated...$k$p$Sbs150|
